Investor_4_pre_2.name: Sofia Hernandez
Investor_4_pre_2.content: Sofia Hernandez has demonstrated an insightful understanding of investor responsibilities, focusing on setting clear expectations and holding her trustee accountable. Throughout the investment process with Mateo Garcia, she actively communicated to safeguard her interests, enhancing her reputation as a strategic and discerning investor. Her commitment to evaluating partnerships diligently continues to reinforce her profile as a fair and profitability-oriented investor.
